projects.name: Vulos
projects.description: An e-commerce platform specializing in clothing and fashion items, offering a seamless shopping experience with modern design and user-friendly interface

projects.name: Media Rater
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for rating and reviewing various forms of media including novels, movies, manga, and anime, allowing users to share their opinions and discover new content

projects.name: Sensomatic Solutions
projects.description: A comprehensive platform offering sensor solutions and IoT technologies, providing innovative sensor-based products and services for various industrial and commercial applications

projects.name: DigiArt
projects.description: A digital art marketplace platform where users can discover and purchase unique digital wallpaper, featuring a curated collection of digital art pieces from various artists

projects.name: Sokobai
projects.description: A classic Sokoban puzzle game implementation using C/C++ and SDL2 for graphics, featuring level loading, player movement, and box pushing mechanics

projects.name: Waste Link
projects.description: A startup company website advocating for Black Soldier Fly (BSF) farming in Cebu, promoting sustainable waste management and organic farming practices through innovative insect-based solutions

projects.name: SmartAqua
projects.description: A smart aquarium app featuring mobile development with React Native, hardware integration with Arduino, and Firebase for authentication and database. The app supports real-time monitoring and control of aquarium conditions.
